title: Hell-O-Ween
description: On Halloween night, two buddies decided to play a cruel trick on the class brain...but the joke was on them.They only wanted to scare their enemy to death but their prank went awry and one of their friends ended up dead, her body ripped to pieces.Soon seven teenagers were frantically fighting to save themselves from unthinkably gruesome ends but something born in the pits of hell was after them and they had no hope for escape.
author: David   Robbins
